OOc: They're inside the base, just for reference :)

Trinity/Windlord::

Tr=
inity looked Grounded and she said happily while she was waving her little =
kitten tail "What beast mode are you Grounded?? "


"Nice to see you Groudn=
ed" said Windlord "What do you want to do? Eat something, rest or meet the =
other members of Chivtrons?... "

"Or play Tag?" said Trinity.

Windlord sm=
iled, and said to Burning Hammer "I haven't seen Perplex in a large while..=
. Grounded, can you stay with Trinity, while Burning Hammer and I find  Per=
plex or if you rather take her to Aerotaur...?"

  Tri=
nity...He transformed and his mole form dove into the ground
  digging his =
way thropugh under enath of Trinity..He popped up in froth
  of the cat bot=
